author: Nick Daino
description: Fetches upcoming MLB game schedules from PlainTextSports and displays them in Discord embeds.
install_msg: Thanks for installing MLBGames! Use `[p]mlb` to see upcoming MLB games. Make sure you have aiohttp and beautifulsoup4 installed: `pip install aiohttp beautifulsoup4`
short: Shows upcoming MLB games from PlainTextSports
